name: FormGent – Next Generation AI Form Builder in WordPress
author: wpWax - Contact Form Plugin & WP Form Builder

sections.description:
Say goodbye to complicated, time-consuming form creation! Meet FormGent, a next-generation, no-code WordPress form builder designed exclusively for the Gutenberg block editor. Whether you‚Äôre building a simple contact form, a dynamic multi-step form, or something entirely custom, FormGent makes it effortless with its intuitive drag & drop based form builder.

Built specifically for the future of WordPress, it‚Äôs fast, powerful, and incredibly easy to use‚Äîright out of the box. Created by wpWax, the same company of Directorist, a leading WordPress directory plugin, FormGent is not just another WP form builder‚Äîit‚Äôs a future-proof solution, offering powerful upcoming features like AI-generated forms, conversational forms, and payment integrations, all within the WordPress ecosystem.

Perfect for business owners, developers, and marketers alike, FormGent simplifies form building without sacrificing flexibility or performance. Ready to transform your form-building experience? Start today with FormGent and watch your user engagement soar!

And this is just the beginning! FormGent comes loaded with the upcoming features like quizzes, payments, conversational forms, and advanced AI-powered forms‚Äîall set for future updates. Our mission is to simplify form building so you can focus on what matters most: collecting data and driving user engagement.

Ready to create powerful forms with ease? Let FormGent take care of the hard work.

How It Works:

FormGent is designed for simplicity. Here‚Äôs how you can quickly start using this drag-and-drop based form builder:

Step 1: Install FormGent Plugin:

From your WordPress dashboard, go to ‚ÄúPlugins,‚Äù search for ‚ÄúFormGent,‚Äù click ‚ÄúInstall Now,‚Äù and activate it.

Step 2: Build Your Form

Once activated, head to the FormGent dashboard, where you can easily create new forms using the drag-and-drop form builder within the Gutenberg editor.

Step 3: Embed Your Form

After creating your form, embed it in any post or page using a shortcode or directly through the Gutenberg block editor.

Step 4: Analyze Results

Access the “All Responses” section to review form submissions, user engagement metrics, and completion data, making it easy to optimize your forms.

üëâ Join Our FB Community : FormGent Community

üëâ Official Facebook Page : Like and Follow on Facebook

üëâ Official Linkedin Page: Follow on LinkedIn

üëâ Official YouTube Channel : Follow on YouTube

üëâ Official Support : Contact

Key Features:

1. Native WordPress Integration: Seamless Form Building

FormGent fully integrates with the native Gutenberg block editor, offering an intuitive WP form builder experience. With its smooth, drag & drop based form builder interface, you don‚Äôt need to navigate multiple systems. FormGent keeps it simple while saving you time.

2. AI-Powered Form Creation: Build Unlimited Forms with Ease

Imagine creating custom forms effortlessly. FormGent‚Äôs AI engine does exactly that. Whether designing a basic contact form builder or a complex multi-step survey, AI handles the heavy lifting, offering field suggestions and optimizing user experience. No technical expertise is required‚ÄîFormGent ensures your forms are functional, user-friendly, and perfectly suited to your audience.

3. Mobile-First, User-Centric Design

In today‚Äôs mobile-first world, responsive forms are essential. FormGent‚Äôs WordPress form builder creates stunning forms that adapt to any device, providing users with a flawless experience, whether on a desktop, tablet, or smartphone. It also adheres to accessibility standards, making your forms usable by everyone.

4. Instant Forms: Share & Publish Effortlessly

Need a form ready in seconds? With FormGent, you can create and publish forms instantly via a unique URL, making them easily shareable on the web, via email, or across social media platforms.

5. Coming Soon: Conversational, Multi-Step Forms üí¨

Turn long forms into engaging conversations. Our upcoming conversational form feature will transform complex forms into step-by-step guided experiences, increasing form completion rates and delivering a personalized user journey.

6. Coming Soon: Payments, Quizzes & More üí∏üìä

Get excited for future updates! Soon, FormGent will support payments, quizzes, and more, turning your WordPress form builder into a complete solution for all your form-building needs‚Äîwithout requiring extra plugins.

7. Built for Gutenberg: A Future-Forward Form Solution üî•

FormGent is fully integrated with the Gutenberg editor, ensuring a seamless, modern form-building experience. No need for extra plugins‚ÄîFormGent is optimized for the future of WordPress, keeping your site fast while providing maximum form-building flexibility.

8. Analytics & Insights: Optimize Your Forms üìä

FormGent offers built-in analytics, allowing you to track how users interact with your forms, see where they drop off, and understand engagement patterns. Use these insights to optimize future forms and boost completion rates.

9. Fast, Lightweight, and Powerful ‚ö°

FormGent is built for performance. This WP form builder is lightweight and efficient, ensuring your website runs smoothly, even as you add complex forms.

Some Powerful Features at a Glance:

  • Gutenberg-Native Form Builder: Seamlessly integrates into the Gutenberg editor, eliminating the need for extra form plugins.
  • Unlimited Forms: Whether it‚Äôs a basic contact form or a multi-step survey, FormGent allows you to create unlimited forms effortlessly.
  • Mobile-First Design: Fully responsive, ensuring flawless performance across all devices.
  • No-Code, Drag-and-Drop: Perfect for both beginners and advanced users, FormGent‚Äôs drag-and-drop based form builder simplifies form creation.
  • AI-Powered Form Adaptation (Coming Soon): Dynamic AI-powered forms that optimize based on user input.
  • Conversational Forms (Coming Soon): Interactive, multi-step forms that guide users through each step like a conversation.
  • Payments, Quizzes & More (Coming Soon): Accept payments directly through forms, build quizzes, and more.
  • Advanced Analytics & Insights: Track user engagement with detailed metrics.
  • Fast & Lightweight: Performance-focused to keep your site fast.

Why Choose FormGent?

  • Simple Yet Powerful: A user-friendly interface paired with powerful features like AI, quizzes, and payment integrations.
  • All-in-One Solution: Everything you need in one WordPress form builder‚Äîno extra plugins required.
  • Built for Gutenberg: Future-proof and optimized for WordPress‚Äôs modern block editor.

Available Form Blocks in FormGent:

  • Name Field üòä
  • Email Field üìß
  • Single-Line Text üìù
  • Multi-Line Text (Textarea) üñäÔ∏è
  • Number Field üî¢
  • Dropdown Field ‚¨áÔ∏è
  • Single Choice (Radio Button) ‚òùÔ∏è
  • Multiple Choice (Checkboxes) ‚úÖ
  • Address Field üìç
  • GDPR Consent Field üõ°Ô∏è
  • Website URL Field üåê

Upcoming Features:

  • AI-Powered Forms: Forms that adjust dynamically to user input.
  • Conversational Forms: Interactive, step-by-step forms designed to increase completion rates.
  • Payments & Quizzes: Integrated payments and quiz creation.

Who is FormGent For?

  • Business Owners & Entrepreneurs: Collect leads, manage surveys, and accept payments‚Äîall with one plugin.
  • Agencies & Developers: Offer clients a seamless WordPress form builder experience.
  • Marketers & Educators: Create quizzes, gather feedback, and analyze user data to improve engagement.
  • Freelancers: Build forms quickly without needing coding expertise.

FormGent is Just Getting Started üéâ

We‚Äôre always improving FormGent to meet the needs of our users. Got feature suggestions? Let us know through our Feedback Form. Together, we‚Äôll make FormGent even better!

OTHER AMAZING PRODUCTS FROM wpWAX

üëâ Directorist ‚Äì Createany kind of directory websites and classified ads listing sites with ease.

üëâ HelpGent ‚Äì Your Ultimate Help Agent for Video, Voice, and Text Messaging with Screen Record Facility

üëâ Legal Pages ‚Äì Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, GDPR, CCPA, and Cookie Notice Generator

üëâ Post Grid, Slider & Carousel Ultimate ‚Äì The easiest and most useful plugin to display blog posts, pages, or custom posts in beautiful post layouts like post grid, post carousel & post slider

üëâ Product Carousel Slider & Grid Ultimate for WooCommerce ‚Äì The most intuitive solution to make your eCommerce site visually appealing by creating WooCommerce product carousel, sliders, or grids easily

üëâ Logo Showcase Ultimate ‚Äì Ultimate logo showcase plugin to create responsive logo carousel, logo slider & logo grid and display unlimited clients, partners, sponsors logos

Support & Documentation

Need help getting started with FormGent? Our detailed documentation and support team are ready to assist you. Visit our Support Page for step-by-step guides and troubleshooting tips.

With FormGent, building forms in WordPress has never been easier or more powerful. Ready to transform your form-building experience? Start with FormGent today!
sections.faq:
Is FormGent compatible with all WordPress themes?

Yes, FormGent works seamlessly with any modern theme that supports Gutenberg.

Can I create multi-step forms with FormGent?

Multi-step forms are coming soon as part of an upcoming update.

Is FormGent optimized for mobile?

Absolutely! FormGent is designed with a mobile-first approach.

Will FormGent support payment forms?

Yes, payment integrations are in the pipeline.

How does FormGent handle user data?

FormGent adheres to GDPR standards, and you can add a GDPR consent field to your forms.

How can I get support if I have an issue?

You can visit our Support Page for help or contact our support team directly. We‚Äôre here to assist you with any issues or questions you may have.

Does FormGent require any coding knowledge?

No, FormGent is designed for users of all skill levels. You can create forms without writing any code, thanks to the intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

Can I track form submissions and user engagement?

Absolutely! FormGent provides built-in analytics to track form submissions, user interactions, and more in the All Responses section.

How can I become a Contributor

If you want to contribute, go to our FormGent GitHub Repository and see where you can help.
sections.changelog:
0.0.6(beta) – 22 October 2024

  • Fixed: Form block not working issue.

0.0.5(beta) – 22 October 2024

  • New: Email Notification Builder ‚Äì Create and customize email notifications with dynamic fields, rich-text formatting, and media integration.
  • New: Added a custom control for block width.
  • New: Export form responses in PDF, CSV, and XLSX formats for flexible reporting.
  • Improved: Enhanced repeater controls with refined styling for a smoother user experience.= 0.0.4(beta) – 20 October 2024 =
  • Initial launch
